content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Accu-Surg® cannulas work in tandem with the Dual Trumpet Valve Handle to offer a high quality, customizable suction/irrigation instrument. Outer cannulas are available in 5mm and 10mm diameters. Laser fibers can be utilized with inner cannulas and secured with a Tuohy Borst adapter.

  • 5mm and 10mm outer cannulas available
  • Inner cannulas for laser fibers
  • Sterilizable
  • Stainless steel construction
  • Compatible with 5mm and 10mm trocar sleeves

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72619″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574469009947{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Cannulas

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]These durable, high quality, and interchangeable stainless steel cannulas all work with the Dual Trumpet Valve Handle. The 5mm and 10mm cannulas are compatible with appropriate sized trocar sleeves. Inner cannulas can grip laser fibers with a Tuohy Borst adapter.

9451L – 5mm x 27.4cm Outer Cannula with Holes
9453L – 5mm x 33cm Outer Cannula with Holes
9451L-0 – 5mm x 27.4cm Outer Cannula without Holes
9453L-0 – 5mm x 33cm Outer Cannula without Holes
9452L-0 – 5mm x 29cm Hydro-Dissection Cannula
9455L – 10mm x 33cm Outer Cannula with Holes
9455L-0 – 10mm x 33cm Outer Cannula without Holes
9458L – 10mm x 33cm Pool Suction Cannula

9301 – Internal Cannula, 1mm x 27.4cm
9301-01 – Internal Cannula, 1 mm x 33cm
9302 – Internal Cannula, 1.5mm x 27.4cm
9302-01 – Internal Cannula, 1.5mm x 33cm
9303 – Internal Cannula, 2.4mm x 27.4cm
9303-01 – Internal Cannula, 2.4mm x 33cm

9330 – Tuohy-Borst Adapter for 600-1000μ fiber
9331 – Tuohy-Borst Adapter for 1000-2300μ fiber[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d544e21-95fe”][vc_column_text]Compatible with all Suction/Irrigation tubing sets. Uses a Luer Lock fitting.
Compatible with trocar sleeves.
Inner cannulas allow for compatibility with most laser fibers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d4e21-95fe”][vc_column_text]Our cannulas are 2 devices, have 510(k) clearance and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a4e21-95fe”][vc_column_text]Our cannulas include a 5 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
